subject: [OT] Re: Unit Testing an EJB
msgSnippet: ... Yes, it s incredibly rude.  I chose to just ignore that and answer it. Most of the People Who Know on here would give a pretty similar answer anyway (which
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Manuel Amago" <mamago@b...> wrote:
> > > ** Replies from J. B. Rainsberger are unwelcome
> >
> > Am I the only person who considers this really, really rude?
> >
>
> You are not alone!
>
> Not only do I find it *extremely* rude

Yes, it's incredibly rude. I chose to just ignore that and answer it.
Most of the People Who Know on here would give a pretty similar
answer anyway (which includes J.B.)

> Not only has no reason been given, but this is a public forum, and,
> as such, you are going to get anyone's opinion on whatever you
> post.

That, to me, would be the whole point of asking a question here.

Dave
